page.title: 06MATTESONS CHOOSE A SITE
page.content: We paid a visit to Mattesons Meat Co. which is a multi_national company and part of Unilever.Their head office is in West Ham,London.We met the site manager.He told us that they bought this factory in 1978 from the Oxo firm, so it had already been used in food production.At the time Mattesons were expanding and they were not sure of their future, so they bought a factory larger than their present needs but at a price that was right.As time has gone on they have increased their sales and expanded into the site's potential.The site manager said it would have cost millions of pounds to have set everthing up on an industrial estate from the beginning.
